context:
Beads description:
Multiple dropdowns on a page conflict because they share the same CSS anchor-name (--dropdown). Fix by allowing users to set a unique anchor name via CSS variable.

Current problem:
- All .dropdown elements get anchor-name: --dropdown
- CSS anchor names are global, so positioning breaks with multiple dropdowns

Solution:
- Use a CSS variable like --anchor-name that users set per-dropdown
- Update demos to show unique anchor names for each dropdown
- e.g. style="--anchor-name: --my-dropdown"
